author: Scott Highfill

review: I purchased a Fire stick before and I loved it so much that I got it as a gift for a friend. The Fire Stick is so very easy to use and install that a 65 year old was able to get it up and running in 15 minutes. I also have the other service, Ch....cast on one of my TV's. It is not as convenient because it has to be attached to a tablet or laptop. With the Fire Stick I simply connected it to the TV port, went through a quick tutorial, and started watching. Also if you are a PRIME member the options offered by the Fire Stick are even better.  Not only would I recommend this item to others, I will be giving away some more as gives to family and friends.
